/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with various signs and advertisements. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds dotting the horizon. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
